name: @universal-translator/plugin
description: Rocket.Chat plugin for Universal Translator Pro

scripts.dev: echo '⚠️  Dev mode requires secure build environment. Use: npm run build:secure' && exit 1
scripts.build-new: echo '⚠️  Direct rc-apps usage blocked for security. Use: npm run build' && exit 1
scripts.deploy: echo '⚠️  Ensure plugin is built securely before deployment' && rc-apps deploy --url $ROCKETCHAT_URL --username $ROCKETCHAT_USER --password $ROCKETCHAT_PASSWORD
scripts.package-check: unzip -t universal-translator-pro.zip && echo '✅ Package is valid'

security.note: @rocket.chat/apps-cli removed from devDependencies to eliminate lodash.template vulnerabilities
security.buildProcess: Uses Docker isolation in build.Dockerfile for secure packaging
vulnerabilitiesMitigated: CVE lodash.template command injection (3 HIGH severity)
